frontmatter.title: UDrink Mobile App
frontmatter.description: Melbourne is a place where coffee culture is extraordinarily important.

`,(0,e.jsx)(r.h1,{children:"Morning Rush for Coffee"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.Chakra.SimpleGrid,{columns:[1,null,2],spacing:"40px",children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.Chakra.Box,{children:(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:`Melbourne is a place where coffee culture is extraordinarily important. Most of the working people from different industries  waste  much  of their break time waiting in line every day both for the morning or afternoon coffee.
This need is observed especially in the Melbourne CBD  which is  full of hidden coffee gems easily spotted by the long lines in front them.
Working people usually have a busy schedule and suffer from long waiting time for coffee.  The solution to overcome this pain by skipping the queue, might help them enjoy their mornings better.`})}),(0,e.jsx)(n.Chakra.Image,{src:`${i}morningRush.jpg`,alt:"Morning Rush for Coffee",borderRadius:"lg"})]}),`

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.Chakra.SimpleGrid,{columns:[1,null,2],spacing:"40px",children:[(0,e.jsxs)(n.Chakra.Box,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:"In order to get honest insight, interviews were held with people waiting in the line of the famous coffee shops in Melbourne CBD."}),(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:"The respondents  were asked about their coffee routines and their familiarity with food ordering apps."}),(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:"To prove and generalise findings, a survey was held with 30 working people with different drinking habits."})]}),(0,e.jsx)(n.Chakra.Image,{src:`${i}researchAndAnalysis.jpg`,alt:"Research & Analysis",borderRadius:"lg"})]}),`

`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:["Buy their coffee ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"on their way from train station to office"})]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:["Staff and baristas were in a ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"very friendly short conversation"})," and ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"recognised every day customers"})]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"Taste and closeness"})," are the major factors"]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:["Customers were from ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"offices nearby"})]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:["Despite the crowd, they ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"don\u2019t prefer to drink free coffee in the office"}),", but to pay for the taste, at least for the morning."]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"Use food ordering apps"})," but prefer to pick up their coffee ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"as they are passing by"})]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(r.li,{children:["Mostly buy the ",(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"same type of coffee everyday"})]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(r.li,{children:(0,e.jsx)(r.strong,{children:"Have favorite coffee shops at different parts of city"})}),`

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.Chakra.SimpleGrid,{columns:[1,null,2],spacing:"40px",children:[(0,e.jsxs)(n.Chakra.Box,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:`With the initial solution, it was tried to introduce a solution
which basically relies on product selection and then pointing the
customer to the coffee shops nearby which serve that product.
A journey basically found in like an e-commerce app, which asks
customer what s/he is looking for \u201Clist me the blue shirts you have\u201D.
However, user testing showed that people have a common sense to see
the coffee shops first and then make their selection from the
available products in there.`}),(0,e.jsx)(r.p,{children:`This might be a difference in experiences between a food ordering app,
and a retail e-commerce app. Therefore, every feature on a shop is shown
on listing and coffee shop screen, like the shop features and menu.`})]}),(0,e.jsx)(n.Chakra.Image,{src:`${i}solutionImpactOverviewWithLogo.jpg`,alt:"Solution & Impact Overview",borderRadius:"lg"})]})]})}function v(t={}){let{wrapper:r}=t.components||{};return r?(0,e.jsx)(r,Object.assign({},t,{children:(0,e.jsx)(p,t)})):p(t)}var x=v;function a(t,r){throw new Error("Expected "+(r?"component":"object")+" `"+t+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}return I(j);})();
